Message.Msg: It's a fixed price auction. I had a quantity of 12 and have sold 2. I guess the "no change back rule" applies to fixed rate with bids as well. Listing was free. Free is good. Did you know if you go to your seller dashboard (My eBay Account Seller Dashboard) it shows you your total eBay sales from the beginning of time? Damn I sold a lot of stuff back in the day. Got your Christmas tree up?
John, how the f do I contact eBay? I can't find a way to email them and the phone system is a run around recording. #$%$?

Upper left hand corner: Customer Support Hit tab: Contact ebay Pick selling tab Pick anything Then on the right: Call Us You should get an 800 number and a 6 digit pass code It usually only take 1-2 minutes to get a real rep in Utah
I did that and got one recording after another before I finally hung up. Are you saying someone eventually picks up the phone? How you like living in Utah?
